--Somando horas em uma data
SELECT SYSDATE, SYSDATE + 5 / 24 as ADD_HORAS FROM TCONTRATO;
SYSDATE             ADD_HORAS          
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
26.02.2022 11:14:00 26.02.2022 16:14:00
